trans-unit.source: This is the repository of Hyper-V documentation powered by MSDN Open Publishing.
trans-unit.target: This is the repository of Hyper-V documentation powered by MSDN Open Publishing.

trans-unit.source: Start contributing to .NET Core documentation using the following steps:
trans-unit.target: Start contributing to .NET Core documentation using the following steps:

trans-unit.source: Edit the Markdown files using your favorite Markdown editor.
trans-unit.target: Edit the Markdown files using your favorite Markdown editor.

trans-unit.source: Wait for a moment and your changes will be automatically published to:
trans-unit.target: Wait for a moment and your changes will be automatically published to:

trans-unit.source: If you don't have the permission to push to this repo, fork it to your own account and use pull request to submit your changes back.
trans-unit.target: If you don't have the permission to push to this repo, fork it to your own account and use pull request to submit your changes back.

trans-unit.source: Before pushing your changes to remote, you can build and preview your doc in local to discover problems early:
trans-unit.target: Before pushing your changes to remote, you can build and preview your doc in local to discover problems early:

trans-unit.source: To validate your changes, just run `msbuild` under the root of the repo.
trans-unit.target: To validate your changes, just run `msbuild` under the root of the repo.

trans-unit.source: Run `msbuild /t:serve` under the root of the repo.
trans-unit.target: Run `msbuild /t:serve` under the root of the repo.
